roleset.name: make right, correct

example.name: right-v: domain-specific
example.text: ``I think [the ship]-1 is now righted *trace*-1, the bilges are pumped and we are on course,'' Mr. Hutchinson said of the restructuring program.

roleset.note: RIGHT-V NOTES: A ship that is upside down is inherently wrong. (from right.01-v)

roleset.name: morally/legally appropriate

example.name: right-j: appropriate, empty it
example.text: When we were in the pub later on , two Argentinians also commented , saying that they did n't think it was right for him to say that , as you would n't expect a Scottish person to say that they were from the UK .
example.arg: as you would n't expect a Scottish person to say that they were from the UK

roleset.note: RIGHT-J NOTES: Updated by Julia based on BOLT-1. (from right.02-j)

roleset.name: suited to

example.name: right-j: both args
example.text: A pirate shirt is right for you.

roleset.note: RIGHT-J NOTES: Added by Julia. (from right.03-j)

roleset.name: be located on the right side

role.descr: theme, entity located on the right

example.name: right-j: Both args
example.text: Ostomy site is right of midline

roleset.note: RIGHT-J NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. No comparison. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from right.04-j)

roleset.name: something due to you by law, tradition or moral principle

role.descr: what they have a right to

example.name: have_right-l: All args, Light Verb Construction
example.text: Anonymous 6:37 , You have every right to live in the country if that 's where you wish to live .
example.arg: that 's where you wish to live

example.name: right-n
example.text: The people's right to have their own arms for their defense is described in the philosophical and political writings of Aristotle, Cicero, John Locke, Machiavelli...
example.arg: to have their own arms for their defense

roleset.note: RIGHT-N NOTES: Roleset based on WebText AMR annotations. Framed by Claire. (from right.01-n)

roleset.name: correct, accurate

role.descr: accurate proposition, thought, right about what

example.name: right-j: all args
example.text: You were right about eating worms.

example.name: right-j: arg1, LOC
example.text: Ron Paul is right on every level but the mainstream media does not want him to get as much talk time as other Puppets such as Rick Santo rum and Mitt Romney

roleset.note: RIGHT-J NOTES: Updated by Julia based on BOLT-1. (from right.01-j)

roleset.name: politically leaning towards conservative

role.descr: the whole group, of which one faction is right

example.name: right-j: arg3
example.text: Rather, it generally constitutes the "far right of the Republican coalition,"

example.name: right-of-center-m
example.text: Now the survey wasn't a comprehensive look at every media outlet that has a right-of-center audience.

example.name: right-wing-j
example.text: Right-wing media personalities have incessantly attacked President Obama's six previous State of the Union addresses

roleset.note: RIGHT-J NOTES: Added by Julia for AMR
RIGHT-WING-J NOTES: Added by Julia for AMR

roleset.name: morally upstanding

example.name: righteous-j
example.text: As such he was made holy, and had right principles; and was righteous in his conversation.

roleset.note: RIGHTEOUS-J NOTES: Added automatically by Julia. Related to right-j.02 (from righteous.01-j)

roleset.name: ok

example.name: alright-j: args 0, 1
example.text: being a pirate is alright with me

example.name: alright-j: args 1, 2
example.text: And I have some reasons why-1 dating is alright for high school students [*-1]

roleset.note: ALRIGHT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6, ok.01. (from alright.01-j)
